title: tckglobal
description:
Multi-Shell Multi-Tissue Global Tractography.

This command will reconstruct the global white matter fibre tractogram that best explains the input DWI data, using a multi-tissue spherical convolution model.

Example use: 

 $ tckglobal dwi.mif wmr.txt -riso csfr.txt -riso gmr.txt -mask mask.mif 
   -niter 1e9 -fod fod.mif -fiso fiso.mif tracks.tck 

in which dwi.mif is the input image, wmr.txt is an anisotropic, multi-shell response function for WM, and csfr.txt and gmr.txt are isotropic response functions for CSF and GM. The output tractogram is saved to tracks.tck. Optional output images fod.mif and fiso.mif contain the predicted WM fODF and isotropic tissue fractions of CSF and GM respectively, estimated as part of the global optimization and thus affected by spatial regularization.

References:

Christiaens, D.; Reisert, M.; Dhollander, T.; Sunaert, S.; Suetens, P. & Maes, F. Global tractography of multi-shell diffusion-weighted imaging data using a multi-tissue model. NeuroImage, 2015, 123, 89-101

grad.title: grad
grad.description: specify the diffusion encoding scheme (required if not supplied in the header).

mask.title: mask
mask.description: only reconstruct the tractogram within the specified brain mask image.

response.title: response
response.description: set one or more isotropic response functions. (multiple allowed)

items.title: riso
items.description: set one or more isotropic response functions. (multiple allowed)

riso.title: riso
riso.description: set one or more isotropic response functions. (multiple allowed)

lmax.title: lmax
lmax.description: set the maximum harmonic order for the output series. (default = 8)

length.title: length
length.description: set the length of the particles (fibre segments). (default = 1mm)

weight.title: weight
weight.description: set the weight by which particles contribute to the model. (default = 0.1)

ppot.title: ppot
ppot.description: set the particle potential, i.e., the cost of adding one segment, relative to the particle weight. (default = 0.05)

cpot.title: cpot
cpot.description: set the connection potential, i.e., the energy term that drives two segments together. (default = 0.5)

t0.title: t0
t0.description: set the initial temperature of the metropolis hastings optimizer. (default = 0.1)

t1.title: t1
t1.description: set the final temperature of the metropolis hastings optimizer. (default = 0.001)

niter.title: niter
niter.description: set the number of iterations of the metropolis hastings optimizer. (default = 10M)

fod.title: fod
fod.description:
Predicted fibre orientation distribution function (fODF).
This fODF is estimated as part of the global track optimization, and therefore incorporates the spatial regularization that it imposes. Internally, the fODF is represented as a discrete sum of apodized point spread functions (aPSF) oriented along the directions of all particles in the voxel, used to predict the DWI signal from the particle configuration.

noapo.title: noapo
noapo.description: disable spherical convolution of fODF with apodized PSF, to output a sum of delta functions rather than a sum of aPSFs.

fiso.title: fiso
fiso.description: Predicted isotropic fractions of the tissues for which response functions were provided with -riso. Typically, these are CSF and GM.

eext.title: eext
eext.description: Residual external energy in every voxel.

etrend.title: etrend
etrend.description: internal and external energy trend and cooling statistics.

balance.title: balance
balance.description:
balance internal and external energy. (default = 0)
Negative values give more weight to the internal energy, positive to the external energy.

density.title: density
density.description: set the desired density of the free Poisson process. (default = 1)

prob.title: prob
prob.description: set the probabilities of generating birth, death, randshift, optshift and connect proposals respectively. (default = 0.25,0.05,0.25,0.1,0.35)

beta.title: beta
beta.description:
set the width of the Hanning interpolation window. (in [0, 1], default = 0)
If used, a mask is required, and this mask must keep at least one voxel distance to the image bounding box.

lambda.title: lambda
lambda.description:
set the weight of the internal energy directly. (default = 1)
If provided, any value of -balance will be ignored.

quiet.title: quiet
quiet.description: do not display information messages or progress status; alternatively, this can be achieved by setting the MRTRIX_QUIET environment variable to a non-empty string.

force.title: force
force.description: force overwrite of output files (caution: using the same file as input and output might cause unexpected behaviour).

nthreads.title: nthreads
nthreads.description: use this number of threads in multi-threaded applications (set to 0 to disable multi-threading).

key.title: key
key.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

value.title: value
value.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

items.title: config
items.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

config.title: config
config.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

help.title: help
help.description: display this information page and exit.

source.title: source
source.description: the image containing the raw DWI data.

response.title: response
response.description: the response of a track segment on the DWI signal.

tracks.title: tracks
tracks.description: the output file containing the tracks generated.
